All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    An atomic alteration of an entity.
    ActionResourceReaderFactory
    ResourceReaderFactory.ActionResource provided by the pancake platform.
    Animated
    Loops through a set of frames.
    Application
    Provides for interactions with the service running the GameLoop.
    Application.Config
    Configuration for running applications.
    Audio
    A configurable and playable piece of audio.
    Audio.State
    A discrete state an audio instance may be in.
    AudioFactory
    Generates Audio instances.
    AudioResourceReaderFactory
    ResourceReaderFactory.AudioResource provided by the pancake platform.
    AutoSerializer<I,​O,​P extends Serializer<I,​O>>
    Serializes using the most appropriate provider of some Serializer type.
    AveragedValue
    A value represented as the average of its previous several samples.
    BoundedValue<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    A value between minimum and maximum bounds.
    BoundedVector
    A vector with min and max constraints along each axis.
    Box
    A 2 or 3 dimensional box.
    Camera
    A viewport on a render medium providing for mapping between absolute and relative/rendered positions.
    CollectiveAction
    An Action which applies a collection of delegate actions.
    Collider
    Provides methods for calculating intersection occurrence and for resolving collisions.
    Component
    A container of entity data.
    ComponentStringSerializer<I extends Component>
    Serializes components to strings.
    CompositeRenderable<T extends Renderable>
    A collection of renderable artifacts rendered as a unit.
    Config
    Provides access to configuration.
    CreateEntity
    Event requesting an entity be created.
    DestroyEntity
    Event requesting an entity be destroyed.
    Entity
    A container of Components of distinct implementation types.
    EntityCreated
    Event broadcast when an entity is created.
    EntityDestroyed
    Event broadcast when an entity is destroyed.
    EntityPool
    A set of uniquely-identified "component-bag" entities.
    EntityStringSerializer
    Serializes entities to strings.
    Event
    Some occurrence broadcast to all registered listeners at the beginning of a tick.
    EventBroadcaster
    Broadcasts events expected by registered systems.
    EventBroadcaster.Managed
    An EventBroadcaster implementation with exposed management methods.
    GameEngine
    Central game management module.
    GameLoop
    Main game loop.
    GameSystem
    Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.
    Image
    A renderable static image.
    Limiter
    A timer which is ready after a set number of ns have elapsed since its previous ready state.
    MapStringSerializer
    Parses maps.
    MultiStageAction
    An Action which applies a different action depending on its current state.
    MultiStageAction.ArmingOption
    Arms a MultiStageAction to change state in a particular way next time it is applied.
    NumberStringSerializer
    Parses numerical values.
    PerformanceCounter
    Maintains performance counts.
    PerformanceCounter.Usage
    Tracks the average time usage of a game system.
    Registry<K,​V>
    A collection of loaded resources retrievable by some key.
    RegistryLoader<K,​V>
    Loads resources into a Registry.
    Renderable
    Something drawable on a RenderMedium.
    RenderableResourceReaderFactory
    ResourceReaderFactory.RenderableResource provided by the pancake platform.
    RenderMedium
    Provides for rendering various graphical artifacts.
    RenderTransform
    Transform settings for rendering a Renderable.
    ResourceReaderFactory<T>
    Generates resource readers attached to a Registry reading resources from strings.
    ResourceReaderFactory.ActionResource
    Generates Action resource readers.
    ResourceReaderFactory.AudioResource
    Generates Audio resource readers.
    ResourceReaderFactory.RenderableResource
    Generates Renderable resource readers.
    Resources
    Provides access to resources.
    Serializer<I,​O>
    Serializes an instance to some other representation.
    Shape<T extends Shape>
    A freeform renderable artifact.
    Shape.Color
    Defines the sRGB color of rendered shapes.
    SharedResources
    A container of GameEngine resources.
    Signature
    A distinct combination of registered component types.
    StringSerializer<I>
    Serializes to strings.
    StringStringSerializer
    Parses text in "".
    Text
    A string of text.
    URIStringSerializer
    Parses values formatted as URIs.
    Vector
    A vector defined as a head at some point in 3 dimensions and a tail at (0, 0, 0).
    VectorStringSerializer
    Serializes Vector.
    Viewport
    A constrained view on a renderable artifact.
